xwikidoc.title: Mocca Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content:
#general MoccaCalendar.calendar=カレンダー MoccaCalendar.calendar.title=カレンダー ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.defaultCalendarTitle=Other Events ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewall=Overview of all calendars ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.create=Create new calendar ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist=agenda ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titlepast=Past Events ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titleupcoming=Upcoming Events ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.nopastevents=No past events found. ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.noupcomingevents=No upcoming events found. ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.firstDayOfWeek=0 ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.viewall=All events ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.create=Create new event ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.backlink=Back to calendar «{0}» ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.confirmDelete=Do you really want to delete the event «{0}» ? ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.view=Event ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.confirmDelete.allEventsButton=All Instances ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.generic.errormessage=Internal Server Error

# validation messages: on save ### Missing: val_title_notvalid=Title field contains invalid characters. ### Missing: val_title_notempty=Title field is required. ### Missing: val_startDateMissing=A start date is missing for the event. ### Missing: val_startDateNotDate=The given start date cannot be read as a date. ### Missing: val_endDateNotDate=The given end date cannot be read as a date. ### Missing: val_endDate=End date must be after start date. ### Missing: val_title_already_exists=An event with this name already exists. ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.firstInstance.notDate=The given first instance date cannot be read as a date. ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.lastInstance.notDate=The given last instance date cannot be read as a date.
# validation messages: Update Service ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.eventUpdated=Updated event time. ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.eventrecurrent=Recurrent events cannot be moved. ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.valuesinvalid=The new event time is invalid. ### Missing: moccacalendar.updates.nodocument=The event is no longer available.
# validation messages: Delete Service ### Missing: moccacalendar.delete.startDateInvalid=The event start date could not be read. ### Missing: moccacalendar.delete.saveMessage=Event instance at {0} deleted.
# validation messages: Modification Service ### Missing: moccacalendar.modify.createMessage=Added modification for one event instance. ### Missing: moccacalendar.modify.saveMessage=Updated modification for one event instance.
# Calendar macro ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Mocca Calendar ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Displays a Calendar ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Show events from ... ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Calendar page ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList'. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00). ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00). ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today.
